attributes.action: Tax people more who use 4x4 off road cars on the school run just to look cool and NEVER use them off road
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tax people more who use 4x4 off road cars on the school run just to look cool and NEVER use them off road when a normal people carrier or estate car will do just the same job and have as mutch space.

rejection.details:
There are already lots of petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=4x4
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
